description:
I connected to https://jupiter.ag-usa.info/ from X (Twitter).  This looked like an official Jupiter Twitter account and a legitimate airdrop.  I connected my Phantom wallet and stupidly signed two transactions: over $2,000 worth of tokens were taken by the scammer.

I connected to https://jupiter.ag-usa.info/ from X (Twitter).  This looked like an official Jupiter Twitter account and a legitimate airdrop.  I connected my Phantom wallet and stupidly signed two transactions: over $2,000 worth of tokens were taken by the scammer.

The following sites have been reported by users as potentially fraudulent. These links are provided for reference and investigative purposes only, not as endorsements.

https://jupiter.ag-usa.info/
